page.title: 20MICKLEY HALL
page.content: technical miracles which help to bring some of the residents comfort and some independence include a 'discus bed'which moves and changes shape at the touch of a button and a'possum'controller through which many things in the room can be switched on or off when the user sucks or blows down a tube.The gardens and grounds can be reached by the residents in their wheel chairs and those who wish to, have access to a craft room. Residents are helped to be as self reliant as possible and are encouraged to help in the running of the home.
